name: You Don´t Mess With the Zohan!
description: Zohan Kills Bad Hair Dead! Throw Combs, Snip with Scissors, and Own Face with a Feet Uppercut until those Follicle Fashion Flops are dazed! Then - Surprise Make-over! Just don´t let the bad hair touch you, or else you´ll run out of Silky Smooth! Mini Description: Kill Bad Hair with Flair!
